heading: Upgrading shouldn't feel this stressful
subtext: You've worked hard to get here. But between conflicting advice and complicated numbers, it's hard to know if you're making the right call.

items.title: Should we buy now or wait?
items.description: Everyone has an opinion. Your parents say one thing, forums say another. It's hard to know what's actually right for your situation.

items.title: New launch or resale?
items.description: Both have pros and cons. But without clear data, you're essentially guessingâ€”and a wrong choice can cost you years of wealth building.

items.title: What if we overstretch?
items.description: You want to give your family a better home, but not at the cost of financial stress. The CPF rules alone are confusing enough.
